text:
Ohhh! How nice! The feel of the new fabric
feels so nice...!

Alright, before I have you try them on...
Did you make up your mind, Yuika?
Yuika, could it be that you still haven't──

N-No, um...
It's just... Mitsumine's been thinking since then...

Which version of Mitsumine
should wear this costume?

...I'm not too sure which one would be more
appropriate.

──...I know I've said this before,
but you should just pick which ever you like...

That's. Exactly. Why!
Mitsumine can't just decide this all on her own...!

...P-tan, with glasses or without glasses,
which one do you think's better?
